title: HyperSnap 7.29.Pack (& portable) by D!akov [Ru]
description:
HyperSnap 7.29.00 RePack (& portable) by D!akov

Description:
HyperSnap 7 is the fastest and easiest way to take screen captures from Windows screen and text capture from places where system text copy is not possible. HyperSnap combines the power of a first-class screen capture application with an advanced image editing utility - wrapped into one easy-to-use tool. Now compatible with Windows 8 desktop mode.

HyperSnap is perfect for capturing images and texts that you want to include in your Help system, online tutorials, manuals, training handouts, presentations, marketing materials, Web pages, emails and more. Captures full screen games using DirectX/Direct3D drivers. Use HyperSnap to quickly share a picture-perfect representation of anything on your screen. Compatible with 32 bit and 64 bit releases of Windows 8 (destkop environment), 7, Vista, XP and corresponding Windows
